Generate Data from a Multivariate Normal Distribution

Source: R/mvn.R
mvn.Rd

Generate Data from a Multivariate Normal Distribution

mvn(n, mu, Sigma)

Arguments

n

Integer. Samples size.
mu

Numeric vector. Mean vector.
Sigma

Numeric matrix. Variance-covariance matrix.

See also

Other multivariate normal data functions: mvn_dat_mar_simulation(), mvn_dat_mar_task(), mvn_dat_mar(), mvn_dat_mcar_simulation(), mvn_dat_mcar_task(), mvn_dat_mcar(), mvn_dat_mnar_simulation(), mvn_dat_mnar_task(), mvn_dat_mnar(), mvn_dat_simulation(), mvn_dat_task(), mvn_dat(), setparamsmvn(), useparamsmvn()

Examples

n <- 100
mu <- c(0, 0)
Sigma <- matrix(data = c(1, 0.50, 0.50, 1), ncol = 2)
mvn(n = n, mu = mu, Sigma = Sigma)
